description: A husband and wife from Turkish immigrant families spearhead a vaccine breakthrough.
title: Coronavirus: Turkish Germans raise new Covid vaccine hopes
title_page: Coronavirus: Turkish Germans raise new Covid vaccine hopes - BBC News
maintext: When news of the virulence of coronavirus was reported in January, based on data from the outbreak in Wuhan, China, BioNTech was already in a good position, as it had teamed up with Pfizer in 2018 to develop mRNA-based flu vaccines.
